SEARCH
Package repository

Class DoctorAvailabilityRepository

Object
DoctorAvailabilityRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Repository<DoctorAvailability,String>
public class DoctorAvailabilityRepository extends Object implements Repository<DoctorAvailability,String>
The DoctorAvailabilityRepository class is responsible for storing and managing the availability information of doctors in a concurrent map. It supports common repository operations such as saving, finding, deleting, and checking existence of doctor availability records. This repository also provides methods to query availability by doctor and date.

    • DoctorAvailabilityRepository

      private DoctorAvailabilityRepository()
      Private constructor to initialize the availability repository. Uses a ConcurrentHashMap to store doctor availability records.

    • save

      public DoctorAvailability save(DoctorAvailability availability)
      Saves a DoctorAvailability record in the repository. If an availability with the same ID already exists, it will be overwritten.
      Specified by:
      save in interface Repository<DoctorAvailability,String>
      Parameters:
      availability - The DoctorAvailability record to save.
      Returns:
      The saved DoctorAvailability record.

    • findByDoctorAndDate

      public Optional<DoctorAvailability> findByDoctorAndDate(Doctor doctor, LocalDate date)
      Finds a DoctorAvailability record for a specific doctor on a specific date.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The Doctor whose availability to search for.
      date - The LocalDate for which the availability is being checked.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the matching DoctorAvailability if found, or an empty Optional if not.
